Reviews.Title: Overall good.
Reviews.Author: Scarlett McConnell
Reviews.Content: Great laptop and quick processor. Looks really nice. The downside is Windows 8. Maybe it's just the old person in me (I'm in my early 20's), but it isn't easy to get used to and they try to force you to not use the desktop mode...or make it difficult to do so.

Reviews.Title: Good Buy
Reviews.Author: Ruthven Wilson
Reviews.Content: Great laptop, good price as well. I got some of the features I wanted and I am satisfied with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: A powerful low priced laptop.
Reviews.Author: Roger Amoroso
Reviews.Content: I bought this laptop to do basic video editing and copying Dvds. It has proven to be quite fast and met my expectations. Some of the apps included in the package were quite useful. Windows 8 was a bit of a challenge at first but I got the hang of it eventually. This laptop was worth the money.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Laptop
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: Feels cheap. It is hard to scroll up and down. Its is okay because it is only used mainly to surf the web and play kids games.

Reviews.Title: Satisfied
Reviews.Author: amber
Reviews.Content: This laptop looks pretty sleek and cool. It's very light weight which is a big plus for us since we carry it around a lot. I hate the fact that it came with Windows 8, but for the price you can't find another comparable laptop that doesn't.I don't like how the trackpad works. The audio is pretty low quality, you'll want headphones and speakers for this thing.

Reviews.Title: its a samsung
Reviews.Author: chad
Reviews.Content: its a samsung so you know you are getting good quality even for the price i paid, it gets the job none nicely, only con is the top of the laptop is a finger print magnet.

Reviews.Title: Great laptop
Reviews.Author: Rodney
Reviews.Content: I purchased this laptop because of the price. It is a simple black case without all the fancy lights. However, it performs well and serves its purpose. I always purchase Samsung products whenever I can because of the quality. Great computer, great price!

Reviews.Title: great value for the price
Reviews.Author: Shari Harris-dunning
Reviews.Content: My 12-year old daughter needed a laptop for school.  So far -- so good!  We went back and forth between getting the Samsung Chromebook, or getting a laptop.  In the end, I'm happy with my choice.

Reviews.Title: Very Nice!!
Reviews.Author: Kevin Murray
Reviews.Content: Very good laptop! It does a great job at surfing the the web!! Keyboard is nice!! Touch pad is a  little sensitive! Was able to install all my favorite programs! Does a good for a 4GB laptop! Overall I am quite happy with it!

Reviews.Title: Samsung Support Does Not Exist
Reviews.Author: Gary J. Olawski
Reviews.Content: Samsung Laptop Model: NP270E5E-K02USPurchase: 10/30/2013 (TigerDirect via Amazon)Delivered: 11/06/2013This laptop worked the first two weeks then after performing a Windows 8 update it stopped working.  The laptop would attempt to boot, show the Samsung splash screen, display a 2-second error message, re-boot and then cycle through the same process over and over again.I contacted Samsung and with the assistance of their technical support person attempted to recover from the error.  After a while he determined that a full restore of the hard drive was warranted and that he would ship me a recovery disk.  I asked him why a recovery disk was not included with the laptop and he said it was because the recovery information is on the hard drive.  You see the hard drive has various partitions including one for the OS (Windows 8) and one for recovery information.  The problem is that if the partitions are compromised, recovery may not be feasible; such is the case with my laptop.I waited for over two weeks for the recovery disk, but it never arrived.  I contacted Samsung again (now a month after receiving the laptop) and spoke with two different customer support people.  I was told is that the recovery disk was not available, that it’s on back order and they don’t know when it will be available again.  I asked what other support options were available since I have a laptop that cannot be utilized.  They offered no further assistance and told me that there is nothing further they can do.Apparently, if you purchase a Samsung product and something goes wrong, you’re on your own.I’ve tried installing Windows 7, but the laptop does not recognize the install disk and none of the F keys respond.I contacted Amazon to see if I could return the laptop, but since it was purchased through TigerDirect and fulfilled by Amazon, it’s TigerDirect’s return policy that applies.  Amazon did contact Tiger Direct on my behalf, but I have not heard back from them to date.

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: Francisco Barros
Reviews.Content: Very faster, big screen, a numeric pad, a single port for audio/mic (like cellphone hand free), dvd recorder, great sound, its ok ! =)

Reviews.Title: Nice laptop but hate Windows 8
Reviews.Author: Ana
Reviews.Content: By the time being the laptop is great. I need a big screen and it is big enough for me. But I don't like Windows 8 nor the fact that you have to do all the dirty work yourself, I mean, basic configuration. It is not difficult for me but it takes time.

Reviews.Title: Not a Laptop designed for Windows 8
Reviews.Author: Juan-Jose
Reviews.Content: This laptop runs great excecpt that the Driver constantly crashes. I did research in an attempt to fix this problem and I found that this type of laptop isn't even designed for windows 8. So that was a bust. If it wasn't for the driver issues I would have loved it. I returned the laptop after one week.

Reviews.Title: Good laptop for basic internet surfing .the processor a little slow . The screen resolution is good .
Reviews.Author: dan
Reviews.Content: Good basic laptop ,had problem it was missing the power supply it took forever for samsung to replace it horrible horrible customer service will never buy samsung product

Reviews.Title: Excellent Laptop
Reviews.Author: Robby
Reviews.Content: I like it, very fast but I dislike Windows 8. I can't wait for the update because it took a while before I could get used to this new OS

Reviews.Title: Fast Working
Reviews.Author: Iris Dunson "irisfromohio"
Reviews.Content: This new series of laptop from Samsung is wonderful. It is fast and easy to use. I got it to do my classwork; it has been perfect for that. Then there is the Windows 8.1 that is perfect for my needs. I am not an organized person and storing my information in the cloud is the solution to that challenge. I am so happy with my choice, now when I upgrade my phone, it will have to be a Samsung.

Reviews.Title: Nice buy
Reviews.Author: Desmond B. Tuck
Reviews.Content: I bought this one to replace a similar earlier model bought a year prior. The hard drive crashed on the original one after one year and 3 days. Luckily I had a Notebook replacement warranty. I popped in an extra 2gb of memory and it's running just fine. Meets all my needs. The case is a bit flimsy, and the CD drive is so lightly constructed, it feels as if you could just snap it off.

Reviews.Title: Good machine for the price
Reviews.Author: GP
Reviews.Content: The notebook was a perfect choice, a great combination of speed and power for almost all applications, while not a desktop, it has as much as many systems in the market today

Reviews.Title: Decent for the price
Reviews.Author: April Weber
Reviews.Content: This laptop is a great laptop for college students on a budget. I am not a fan of the new Windows 8, as it has way too many glitches. I do like being able to put apps on my screen and switch back and forth between them, plus the screen is big enough to have movie night with, which is always great. I just wish that the home screen and the app screen didn't always switch back and forth without warning. All in all, this is a great laptop for your casual usage individual.

Reviews.Title: Good value
Reviews.Author: Savvy consumer "Usually a Happy Camper"
Reviews.Content: This is my second Samsung. When we needed an additional laptop, I went with a second Samsung because the first one has given us good service for almost two years now.

Reviews.Title: It's cheap and it is not the strongest laptop
Reviews.Author: Hunter
Reviews.Content: Of course, this laptop is so cheap. Someone want both cheap and strongest laptop. That is impossible. This is a cheap laptop, and you can use it for office works. You can also use it for some basic tasks, play some basic games, surf internet.. If you are Designer, Gamer, Engineer or Architect, you should not choose this laptop. You can find another laptop more expensive and stronger such as:http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00DVFMDOC/ref=as_li_ss_tl?ie=UTF8&camp;=1789&creative;=390957&creativeASIN;=B00DVFMDOC&linkCode;=as2&tag;=best-refer-20the most disadvantage of this laptop is the weak CPU: 1.8 GHz PentiumYou should choose a laptop with Duo Core CPU or Core i3, i5, i7 CPU use to run professional programsWhy don't try this:http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00CMXDI5W/ref=as_li_ss_tl?ie=UTF8&camp;=1789&creative;=390957&creativeASIN;=B00CMXDI5W&linkCode;=as2&tag;=best-refer-20

Reviews.Title: gajbsh sa jzbzg svabs bnda Jsv nice laptop
Reviews.Author: julio murder
Reviews.Content: I like because is the new tecnology imnovetion of future nice monitor with good imagination for people used this laptop
